mapper.sql: id as id , universityId as universityId , universityName as universityName , majorName as majorName , educationLevel as educationLevel , salaryRank as salaryRank , jobRank as jobRank , majorFeature as majorFeature , gainDegree as gainDegree , majorId as majorId , majorRank as majorRank , majorType as majorType , majorSubject as majorSubject , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , isDelete as isDelete , flag1 as flag1 , flag2 as flag2 , flag3 as flag3 , flag4 as flag4 , flag5 as flag5
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_university_major ( universityId, universityName, majorName, educationLevel, salaryRank, jobRank, majorFeature, gainDegree, majorId, majorRank, majorType, majorSubject, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, isDelete, flag1, flag2, flag3, flag4, flag5 ) VALUES ( #{universityId}, #{universityName}, #{majorName}, #{educationLevel}, #{salaryRank}, #{jobRank}, #{majorFeature}, #{gainDegree}, #{majorId}, #{majorRank}, #{majorType}, #{majorSubject}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{isDelete}, #{flag1}, #{flag2}, #{flag3}, #{flag4}, #{flag5} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_university_major
universityId = #{universityId},
universityName = #{universityName},
majorName = #{majorName},
educationLevel = #{educationLevel},
salaryRank = #{salaryRank},
jobRank = #{jobRank},
majorFeature = #{majorFeature},
gainDegree = #{gainDegree},
majorId = #{majorId},
majorRank = #{majorRank},
majorType = #{majorType},
majorSubject = #{majorSubject},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
isDelete = #{isDelete},
flag1 = #{flag1},
flag2 = #{flag2},
flag3 = #{flag3},
flag4 = #{flag4},
flag5 = #{flag5},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_university_major
universityId = #{map.universityId},
universityName = #{map.universityName},
majorName = #{map.majorName},
educationLevel = #{map.educationLevel},
salaryRank = #{map.salaryRank},
jobRank = #{map.jobRank},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_university_major ( universityId, universityName, majorName, educationLevel, salaryRank, jobRank, majorFeature, gainDegree, majorId, majorRank, majorType, majorSubject, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, isDelete, flag1, flag2, flag3, flag4, flag5 ) VALUES ( #{map.universityId}, #{map.universityName}, #{map.majorName}, #{map.educationLevel}, #{map.salaryRank}, #{map.jobRank}, #{map.majorFeature}, #{map.gainDegree}, #{map.majorId}, #{map.majorRank}, #{map.majorType}, #{map.majorSubject}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.isDelete}, #{map.flag1}, #{map.flag2}, #{map.flag3}, #{map.flag4}, #{map.flag5} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, universityId
, universityName
, majorName
, educationLevel
, salaryRank
, jobRank
, majorFeature
, gainDegree
, majorId
, majorRank
, majorType
, majorSubject
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, isDelete
, flag1
, flag2
, flag3
, flag4
, flag5
FROM zgk_university_major
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND universityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityId} , '%')
AND universityName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityName} , '%')
AND majorName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorName} , '%')
AND educationLevel like CONCAT('%', #{condition.educationLevel} , '%')
AND salaryRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.salaryRank} , '%')
AND jobRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.jobRank} , '%')
AND majorFeature like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorFeature} , '%')
AND gainDegree like CONCAT('%', #{condition.gainDegree} , '%')
AND majorId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorId} , '%')
AND majorRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorRank} , '%')
AND majorType like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorType} , '%')
AND majorSubject like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorSubject} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND isDelete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isDelete} , '%')
AND flag1 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag1} , '%')
AND flag2 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag2} , '%')
AND flag3 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag3} , '%')
AND flag4 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag4} , '%')
AND flag5 like CONCAT('%', #{condition.flag5} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
